mapper.insert: insert into service_period ( start_date, end_date, combo_id, contract_info_id, spot_check_schedule_id, web_count, status, service_period_num, site_code, create_time, modify_time ) values ( #{startDate}, #{endDate}, #{comboId}, #{contractInfoId}, #{spotCheckScheduleId}, #{webCount}, #{status}, #{servicePeriodNum}, #{siteCode}, now(), now() )
mapper.select:
SELECT COUNT(id) AS periodNum, contract_info_id as contractInfoId FROM service_period
group by contract_info_id
